Let's Try Talking

December 28, 2011

Lips move and sound happens,
Words come together, sentences form,
But communication never occurs,
Nothing transfers.

One party to another:
Talking, waving, motioning,
Eyes wide, mouth agape,
Ears closed.

Want connection? Meet rejection!
No true things are ever spoken.
Feel some feelings, don’t try sharing,
Talk about the things you’re wearing.

A whisper, scream, or in between,
If what you’re saying: it’s important!
Just remember, they’re only playing –
an expected part, one they’re portraying.
